# Research II

## Reuse

The reuse of research data can take many forms



| Purpose                       | Advantage                       | Needs                                          |
|-------------------------------|---------------------------------|------------------------------------------------|
| Answer new research questions | Saves resources                 | analysis potential of data, good documentation [@Steinhardt.etal.2021; @Logan.etal.2021] |
| Teaching / student theses     | Real-life-oriented education    | good documentation                             |
| Meta-analyses                 | Easier estimation of parameters | Strictly reproducible code [e.g., @Burgard.etal.2022] |
| Historical perspective        | Data as historical artifacts    | Potential of data varies                       |
